item.description:
The AUGUST Permaculture Meetup is happening in Gorham - about 11 miles SW of Portland. This will be a very special meetup since we'll have a chance to look at a property in it's early stages (energy efficient home under contruction) and give feedback to Lee, Tom and Kira on some permaculture approaches to their place!

This will be a *potluck* event, with grazing starting around 6:30 and the regular meeting starting at 7:00.

DIRECTIONS: See FILES link on this page for map! Gorham ctr (intersect of route 114 and 25) take Route 25 toward Standish. ~ 2 miles from Gorham center to Wood Rd on left ~ 1 mile to Jordan Dr on right First house on left (Taggart sign)"

group.name: Portland Maine Permaculture & The Resilience Hub

item.name: The Portland Maine Permaculture August Meetup
